Message.Title: Good Morning From Beautiful And Friendly Philadelphia
Message.Msg: There is no better city in the nation when the first morning sun hits the crisp cool night air, on one's porch, with one's lovely happy long term wife, and a good cup of java. Life is good. So good! Too bad we have to look at a red chart all weekend because we know that makes our crazies even crazier. I hope that helps.

Topic.Title: The Unspeakable Failure That Is John Osborne, Ebay's Lonely Failing Z50com

Message.Msg: I find it amusing that you egg on the daily public train wreck that is John Osborne, but we all know you're never there to pick up the pieces as he crashes and burns, nor will you suffer (you pretend) when he finally implodes and wrecks what little remains of his "life". You find in the long run all the people that you both obsess on were never ever your real problem. You're just choking on hate with no one willing to Heimlich you. A fate worse than death. You will see.

Topic.Title: If madbezos could type like Patrick Swayze in Ghost from the other side...

Message.Msg: Thank you for your kind words but I never claimed any stock insight. You're thinking of the amazing Dr Clarify, whose program made so many of us wealthy. In spite of that gifted knowledge available, there is a pair here who are worse off than 2005. Sad. And sadder yet they seem to publicly revel in their degradation and shame. Nothing would ever make me fail my child or abandon her with her baby. No actual human ever could do that. I hope that helps.

Message.Title: A Tiny Sane Clue For "TEAM"
Message.Msg: First, thanks for another public post publicly admitting you cyber stalk. That, long ago, was all the probably cause needed to gather everything on you (legally) and have you under observation. Second, there were no 4 hateful posts today, until yours. Oh, and your next one, and your post after that. You are the "Team" (John Osborne basically) who first started the name posting here, and you beg daily for that to continue. Third, all of your info is basically wrong, but that hasn't stopped your team from publicly bashing and gloating over the death of who you thought I was. That is really low class but some of the least of your public crimes. Fourth, the "We" you speak of are not many at all and have been well bagged and tagged for the purposes of our experiment. And fifth, a gang of cyber stalking publicly exposed and rant spamming mental patients on chat board will never endanger men. Only themselves. Your "life" is sad and could use the laughs, but the joke has always been on you, and at your expense. I hope that helps. You're not going to like what else might.
well done!
